channel.title: How do you make Infinite HP?
channel.description: Hello, I am wondering how to make Infinite HP.. I am always AFK so if I am in pk, my players pk me and steal admin items.. Anyone know how to add Infinite HP to the char? (I have "Raid Scape" Source.)

item.title: How do you make Infinite HP?
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

Well yeah perfect rings are nice but if your server dosnt have one open a file called ITEMS and just press ctr + f and type perfect ring and then look across and make its bonuses higher.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make Infinite HP?

item.title: How do you make Infinite HP?

item.description:
@combarcapes wrote:

i downloaded a client with a ring called ‘perfect ring’, you could kill everyone in one hit and it gave high def bonus.I think the code was 0773, ask burke who owns burke server for more information on it.

item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327

@iceman327 wrote:

That’s lazy, you gotta be able to turn it off or else you’ll have to go back into your client.java and change it everytime you wanna pk.

item.title: How do you make Infinite HP?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

i know an easier way i didnt have to declare any boolean. but you cant turn it on and off…

just open ur client.java
search for

public boolean process

under that just add this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("omgowned")){ // this infinity health if(IsDead) IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }

basicly does the same thing as his, just a lil less code

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make Infinite HP?
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

declaring a variable is like doing this: int thisVariable;

initializing a variable is like this: int thisVariable = 0;

declaring is just MAKING the variable w/ no set value, initializing it is when you give it an actual value…now for boolean its only either true or false.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make Infinite HP?
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

Uhm you need 15 reputation if I’m not mistaken to rep another person.

Add it into Client.java

First Declare it underneath another void,

Then add the command with your other commands,

Then add that inside your public boolean process or in Czar public void process.

item.title: How do you make Infinite HP?
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

Declare this

public boolean infiniteHealth = false;

Add these commands

[code]if(command.startsWith(“undead”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
infinityHealth = true;
stillgfx(absY, absX, 453);
sendMessage(“You are now invincible.”);
}

    if(command.startsWith("dead") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
infinityHealth = false;
stillgfx(absY, absX, 453);
sendMessage("You are no longer invincible.");
}[/code]

Add this under your boolean process

[code]if(infiniteHealth == true) {
if(IsDead)
IsDead = false;
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
}

if(infiniteHealth == false) {
    if(IsDead)
    IsDead = true;
    }

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make Infinite HP?
